import './index.css' const CommentItem = props => { const {commentDetail, toggleLike} = props const {name, comment, isLiked} = commentDetail const onClickLike = () => toggleLike(commentDetail.id) const likeImg = isLiked ? 'https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/react-js/comments-app/like-img.png' : 'https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/react-js/comments-app/liked-img.png' return (

  • {name[0]}

    {name}

    2 minutes ago

    {comment}

    • ) } export default CommentItem
